# GENERAL SETTINGS Adjust settings for connection to wireless networks. | Option | Description | |-----------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | **NAME** | Choose a name (**NAME**) to identify the camera on the wireless network (the camera is assigned a unique name by default). | | **RESIZE IMAGE FOR SMARTPHONE** | Choose whether to resize images for upload to smartphones. Resizing applies only to the copy uploaded to the smartphone; the original is not affected.
â€¢ **ON**: Larger images are resized to 3M for upload.
â€¢ **OFF**: Images are uploaded at their original size. | | **GEOTAGGING** | Choose whether location data downloaded from a smartphone are embedded in pictures as they are taken. | | **LOCATION INFO** | Display the location data last downloaded from a smartphone. | | **BUTTON SETTING** | Choose the role played by the **Fn** button during playback.
â€¢ âœ± **PAIRING/TRANSFER ORDER**: The **Fn** button can be used for pairing and selecting images for transfer during playback.
â€¢ ðŸ“¶ **WIRELESS COMMUNICATION**: The **Fn** button can be used during playback to establish wireless connections. | ## INFORMATION View the cameraâ€™s MAC and Bluetooth address. ## RESET WIRELESS SETTING Restore wireless settings to their default values.

items.value: Adjust settings for connection to wireless networks.
items.md: Adjust settings for connection to wireless networks.

rows: Choose a name (**NAME**) to identify the camera on the wireless network (the camera is assigned a unique name by default).

Choose whether to resize images for upload to smartphones. Resizing applies only to the copy uploaded to the smartphone; the original is not affected.
â€¢ **ON**: Larger images are resized to 3M for upload.
â€¢ **OFF**: Images are uploaded at their original size.
Choose whether location data downloaded from a smartphone are embedded in pictures as they are taken.
Display the location data last downloaded from a smartphone.

Choose the role played by the **Fn** button during playback.
â€¢ âœ± **PAIRING/TRANSFER ORDER**: The **Fn** button can be used for pairing and selecting images for transfer during playback.
â€¢ ðŸ“¶ **WIRELESS COMMUNICATION**: The **Fn** button can be used during playback to establish wireless connections.
